feed.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
feed.subtitle: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

entry.title: Red Birds Face
entry.content:
The Birds Red watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant poly..

Price: $30.00

entry.title: Scent of a Wombat
entry.content:
The 'Scent of a Wombat' comes with one Birds Red watch face and one Black strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch..
